src/models/metrics.py.description: CostForecast model added for 7-day cost forecasting. Uses JSONB for hourly_prices (168 hours), daily_costs, confidence_intervals, and usage_pattern. Includes best_window_* fields for optimal timing recommendations.

src/services/price_prediction_service.py.description: Added calculate_mape method for computing MAPE, MAE, RMSE, R² accuracy metrics comparing predictions with actual MarketSnapshot data. Also added get_accuracy_history for querying historical accuracy. PredictionAccuracy model stores these metrics with hourly/daily breakdowns.

src/api/v1/endpoints/spot/cost_forecast..description: Cost forecast endpoint created at GET /cost-forecast/{gpu_name}. Returns 7-day cost predictions with daily aggregations and confidence intervals. Uses PricePredictionService.forecast_costs_7day(). Query params: usage_hours_per_day (default 8), machine_type (default interruptible). Schema file at src/api/v1/schemas/spot/cost_forecast.py.

src/services/calendar_integration_servic.description: CalendarIntegrationService created for Google Calendar integration. Uses OAuth with calendar.readonly and calendar.events scopes. Features: fetch_events(), create_suggestion(), OAuth token refresh, compute-intensive task detection via keywords. Follows singleton pattern like other services. Environment vars: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_TOKEN_JSON, GOOGLE_CALENDAR_CREDENTIALS_JSON.

web/src/components/cost-forecast/CostFor.description: Added calendar event overlay using custom Chart.js plugin (calendarEventPlugin) that draws vertical dashed lines for calendar events. Uses getCalendarEventIndices() to map events to chart x-axis positions. Fetches from /api/v1/metrics/spot/calendar-status and /calendar-events APIs. Shows "Reconnect Calendar" button when calendarStatus.needs_reauthorization is true.

web/src/components/cost-forecast/Optimal.description: OptimalTimingCard component for job timing optimization. Uses POST /api/v1/metrics/spot/optimal-timing API with gpu_name, job_duration_hours, and machine_type. Displays top 3 time windows with cost savings, recommendation badges (excellent/good/fair), and savings progress bars. Follows SpotPrediction.jsx patterns with dark theme and Tailwind classes.

web/src/components/cost-forecast/BudgetA.description: BudgetAlertSettings component for budget alert configuration. Uses Radix UI Slider and Switch primitives. API endpoints: GET/POST /api/v1/metrics/spot/budget-settings. Features threshold slider, email notifications, daily digest toggle. Follows SpotPrediction.jsx patterns.

web/src/components/cost-forecast/Accurac.description: AccuracyTracker component for displaying ML prediction accuracy. Shows MAPE as accuracy percentage (100% - MAPE), with evaluation period label (Last 30 days). Includes metrics grid (MAPE, R², MAE, RMSE), accuracy level badges, loading/error states. Uses GET /api/v1/metrics/spot/forecast-accuracy/{gpu_name} endpoint.
